system.description: Knuckledusters cover a range of items that reinforce the fist, particularly the knuckles, to make punches hit harder than normal, while also protecting the puncher’s hand from the impact. They’re a common street weapon, and while purpose-made versions exist, most are improvised tools, modified work gloves, handwraps with metal studs or coins folded into the cloth, or roughly-shaped metal that fits around the hand. While they make for effective weapons–when used by someone who knows how to punch– they have no real place outside of street gangs and other low-born fights.
